reviewerName: Juan Alvarez "Latin American Road Warrior and...
reviewtext: We live in a roof top apartment and have a nice view of the city.  Got these principally to be able to zoom in and see different details in the neighborhood and the city.We are binocular newbies - did not have any difficulties figuring out how to use them and are pleased with the purchase - we've had a lot of fun with these binoculars.
